title: rin the yordle's oc as an actual champion
body:
as i see all of rin elenika's ilustrations,i personally i admire her oc greatly. i find that her weapons and attacks are very unique and i feel that id absolutely ADORE using her. picturing it id probably die of a joy induced heart attack if they added rin because i am a huge yordle fan. i think that her wing like weapons made of energy will be very interesting to use in battle. i would like to see how the abilities would be and would she be made to fight with hiemerdinger like amumu with annie. i find it very realistic to put a champion like rin in league of legends. And along with that a lot of hardcore fans would spend anything to use a character like that so it would also contribute both rin giving her poblicity and making a large profit for the company. i hope that my words will be heard in this. and if you want to give a 13 year old boy a heart attack and kill him give a shout out on youtube infront of all of your audience and i will die without a doubt
 


sincerely: Dax
